an5.255:1.1: “Pañcannaṃ, bhikkhave, macchariyānaṃ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
an5.255:1.4: kulamacchariyassa … lābhamacchariyassa … vaṇṇamacchariyassa … dhammamacchariyassa pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
an5.255:1.5: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ macchariyānaṃ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
